latestAction.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S1359; text: CR S1358-1359)

title: A resolution honoring the life of Nebraska community leader Howard L. Hawks.
ai_summary: A resolution honoring the life of Nebraska community leader Howard L. Hawks. Hawks was a well-known community leader in the Omaha area. The resolution was passed by the Nebraska House of Representatives on Tuesday. It was the first time the House had passed a resolution honoring a community leader since the 1970s. The vote was unanimous in favor of the resolution, and it was approved by the Senate on Wednesday. For more information, go to www.nebraska.gov/legislation/Howard-L-Hawks.
